rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0010
rows.name: My bad, Princess.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0020
rows.name:
They're making you do what probably
should've been my job.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0030
rows.name: Still, you made BLADE what it is today.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0040
rows.name: That's a fact.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0050
rows.name: They answer to you now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0060
rows.name: It's your voice they gotta hear.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0070
rows.name: I am not originally a creature of Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0080
rows.name:
I'm just a refugee. Someone who washed up there,
after losing my home.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0090
rows.name: And yet...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0100
rows.name:
your Earth accepted me with all the compassion
of a place your people rightly call their mother.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0110
rows.name:
That compassion... It lives on in the hearts of
everyone here, who owe their lives to Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0120
rows.name: It is...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0130
rows.name: the love that saved me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0140
rows.name: We all mourned the Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0150
rows.name: And once again,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0160
rows.name: we'll have to say goodbye to Mira, our newfound home.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0170
rows.name: To be frank,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0180
rows.name: I had nearly given up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0190
rows.name:
It felt like I was fated to wander forever,
seeking one haven after another...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0200
rows.name: But now, I've stopped with the what-ifs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0220
rows.name: With each new land I came to, my spirit—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0230
rows.name:
whatever you could call my soul—
evolved into something new.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0240
rows.name: Heh... "Soul..."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0250
rows.name:
Sounds grandiose, but that's exactly
what lives in us and in every mim.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0260
rows.name: It's the will that compels us to exist.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0270
rows.name: No matter how cruel and unforgiving the environment,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0280
rows.name: that will gave you the strength to carry on,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0290
rows.name: honed spirits,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0300
rows.name: and perfected your souls.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0310
rows.name: Your search for a new haven, then...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0320
rows.name: was not mindless flight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0330
rows.name: It was all...a journey to enlightenment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0340
rows.name: Very soon, we will leave Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0350
rows.name: The opposition will be fierce. We may not all make it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0360
rows.name: But...I'll say it again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0370
rows.name: Don't forget—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0380
rows.name: This battle... It's not just to flee from danger.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0390
rows.name: It's to live, and it's to make our souls blossom.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0400
rows.name: Fate does not shape our future,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0410
rows.name: our spirit does.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0420
rows.name: Our will to live![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0430
rows.name: Oorah![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0450
rows.name: ...I love you all, with all my heart.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0460
rows.name: Okay...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0470
rows.name: let's do it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33100100_MSG0480
rows.name: Right then. All units, move out![ST:wait ]
